name: Make Lame
description:
A game created with the Collaboration of Max Robert Studios and Gamez Eternal

With the production time of 15 hours, we proudly present to you:

Make Lame.

A shooter game where you have to kill the snobby electric scooter guys!

Rules:

You have 10 seconds to kill as many electric scooters as you can. You gain extra time and score if you kill or damage the enemies. You lose time and score if you hurt the elderly.

Win if you reach 10.000 Score!

Credits: 

Music & Art & Scripting - Robert Bünsow

Game Design & Scripting - Cedric Fredmer
